Literature.Title: A novel antimicrobial peptide, scolopendin, from Scolopendra subspinipes mutilans and its microbicidal mechanism.
Literature.Author: Lee W, Hwang JS, Lee DG

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Enterococcus faecium ATCC 19434(MIC=5µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=5µM),Staphylococcus aureus 03ST33(MIC=10µM),Staphylococcus aureus 03ST30(MIC=5µM),Escherichia coli O157:H7 ATCC 43895(MIC=5µM),Salmonella typhimurium ATCC 19430(MIC=5µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=5µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa 97K015(MIC=5µM),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=12.5µM),Candida parapsilosis ATCC 22019(MIC=12.5µM),Trichosporon beigelii KCTC 7707(MIC=12.5µM),Malassezia furfur KCTC 7744(MIC=25.0µM)
